mapper.insert: INSERT INTO resumes (personal_id, resumes_title, resumes_picture, resumes_introduce, created_at) VALUES(#{personalId}, #{resumesTitle}, #{resumesPicture}, #{resumesIntroduce}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT p.personal_name, d.personal_email, d.personal_phone_number, r.resumes_title, r.resumes_picture, r.resumes_introduce FROM resumes r INNER JOIN personal p ON r.personal_id = p.personal_id INNER JOIN personal_detail d ON p.personal_id = d.personal_id where resumes_id = #{resumesId}
